title: The SWH systems shall be mandatory in hospitals and hotels, where the hot water requirement is of continuous nature
clause_text: The SWH systems shall be mandatory in hospitals and hotels, where the hot water requirement is of continuous nature. In these buildings, the system shall be provided with auxiliary electrical back-up.
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.
